name: Suspicious Super Magnificent Pizza
desc: An exceedingly sumptuous pizza. If one ignores the grease for a moment, the cold meat chunks can still be forced down, but the stale pastry poses quite the challenge nonetheless... With how hard it is, perhaps you could lay a hilichurl out with it?

value.text: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 25% and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Super Magnificent Pizza
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Super Magnificent Pizza.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Ham
customize.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

customize.name: Super Magnificent Pizza
customize.desc: An exceedingly sumptuous pizza. First lay out a base of ham, then add in meat that has been chopped up into little bits for a dish that packs an unrivaled sense of satisfaction. Once roasted, the char of meat and the creamy flavor of the cheese are truly a tantalizing combination.

customize.name: Delicious Super Magnificent Pizza
customize.desc: An exceedingly sumptuous pizza. Amidst the heat that rises as it freshly exits the oven, give the crisp edges a gentle pull â€” a veritable waterfall of cheese gushes forth, wrapped up in the dense aroma of meat that satisfies the taste buds and gives a wondrous, hearty sense of fullness.
